A rich upper class girl falls for her classmate, a poor but smart boy from the lower social strata. The girl's influential family fiercely opposes the lovers and the village erupts in violence. The young couple elope to the city to start a fresh life but fate has other plans.
EXCLUSIVE! Perizaad Zorabian on being a Murgivaali Chapter 2
such a beautiful concept & nice visuals extrodinary making wonderful movie in sandalwood songs are really nice good family entertainment story super...!
A good movie with a good message.. beautiful cinematography, Nishant and Rinku both acted well. Director S.Narayan narrated the screenplay in his style

Lower caste and poor boy Parshu is in love with upper caste Sanju, daughter of the local politician. The duo are attracted to each other and a young romance is blossoming. But with caste politics and opposition at play, a lot lies in store ahead for them.
